casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Ferguson, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Ferguson (1988), 40 Ohio St. 3d 602.]

(No. 87-1905 Submitted October 25, 1988 Decided November 30, 1988.) Michael Miller, prosecuting attorney, and Bonnie L. Maxton, for appellant. James Kura, county public defender, and Barbara J. Slutsky, for appellee.

This appeal is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed,

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ-> concur. Holmes, J., dissents.
